aka: Nothing will Separate us - The Hundred Years of S.C Internacional
this_title: Nada vai nos separar - Os Cem Anos do S.C.Internacional
trans_title: Nothing will Separate us - The Hundred Years of S.C Internacional
introduction: "Nothing will Separate us" is the feature film that came into the world to tell this love story, the immortal union of a team (S.C. Internacional) and its fans over a hundred years. It is not a film to just narrate facts or show goals. It is a film whose mission is to rescue for future generations the moments of joy and pain, suffering and ecstasy that forged a strong and faithful crowd, which paved the path of the team's victories, from the dirt fields of Cidade Baixa to the International Stadium of Yokohama where they became world club champions by defeating the mighty Barcelona in an electrifying final.
chinese_title: Nada vai nos separar - Os Cem Anos do S.C.Internacional
